column4: Is there a known problem with breazy's xserver-xorg-core_6.8.2-77_i386 package ? i keep getting  unable to create `./usr/X11R6/lib/modules/extensions/libGLcore.a': No such file or directory
why are you installing the pkg? did you remove it or something?
doing a dist-upgrade is problematic in my experience, you'd be better off backing up data and doing a CD install
